sign.name: Aries

trait.name: Optimistic
trait.description: Always looks for the bright side of things.

trait.name: Friendly
trait.description: Easily makes friends and enjoys social interactions.

trait.name: Pessimistic
trait.description: Tends to focus on the negatives rather than positives.

trait.name: Stubborn
trait.description: Reluctant to change opinions or viewpoints.

sign.description: Dynamic and competitive, Aries are born leaders with a passion for action.
